name: LOOP link to Ewell West station

ai.summary: A short, easy circular walk of 0.8 km that starts and ends at Ewell West station. This light route weaves through nearby greenspace and residential streets, making it ideal for a quick stroll, families, or a gentle warm-up hike.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat terrain with a mix of pavements, compact trails, and a little parkland. Includes a couple of road crossings and a few shared-use paths; suitable for beginners.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and watch for cyclists and other pedestrians on shared routes. Cross at designated crossings near the station and be mindful of traffic in urban sections. Carry a light or wear reflective clothing in low light, and bring a small amount of water. Daylight can be limited in winter.
recommended_gear: Mobile phone with offline map or map app
ai.best_seasons: Best in spring and autumn for mild, comfortable conditions; itâ€™s feasible year-round in the UK, just plan for shorter daylight hours in winter.

seo.meta_description: Explore a quick 0.8 km easy loop starting and ending at Ewell West station, UK. Perfect for a family stroll or a gentle beginner hike.
